events.message: Applicant submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and consolidate previous debts.
Loan application has been categorised as a personal loan based on the applicant's stated purpose related to medical bills.
A loan officer was assigned to assist the applicant throughout the personal loan process and answer any questions.
Completed an initial review of the personal loan application, checking for completeness and verifying applicant details.
Requested additional documentation from the applicant, including recent pay stubs and medical bills for verification.
Applicant submitted all requested documents promptly, including income proof and detailed medical expense reports.
Credit check was completed, revealing a solid payment history though some outstanding balances from previous loans.
Risk assessment evaluated moderate risk due to existing debts, but overall applicant financials support loan approval.
Loan offer presented to the applicant with an attractive interest rate, repayment terms, and detailed schedule.
Applicant responded positively to the loan offer, requesting clarification on minor details about repayment options.
Application was escalated to senior loan officer to review additional requests made by applicant before final approval.
Loan approved by management following senior review, confirming terms agreed with the applicant are feasible.
Funds were disbursed to the applicant's bank account ensuring prompt access to cover medical bills and debt repayment.
Follow-up call was made to confirm the applicant has received the funds and to check if any further assistance is needed.
Loan application was formally closed after successful funding and completion of all formalities with the applicant.
